title: Santa Riot
body: Riot should gift everyone that hasn't been naughty this year :3

replies.body: They did that last year and majority of the community got free stuff. YOu really think Tencent's going to allow that again?

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k3IzRTPA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-25T05:49:15.557+0000)
>
> They did that last year and majority of the community got free stuff. YOu really think Tencent's going to allow that again?

Tencent has been technically the legal owner of Riot since early 2011, when they'd already owned the majority of Riot's shares, though Riot only sold all of its remaining equity to Tencent in late 2015 but that really doesn't mean much at that point (at least I wouldn't say so).

So yeah, I wouldn't say it's that fair to blame everything onto Tencent.

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k3IzRTPA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-25T05:49:15.557+0000)
>
> They did that last year and majority of the community got free stuff. YOu really think Tencent's going to allow that again?

tencent love festivity and a day without making as much money as possible is alright if its a holiday
